email.title: Sponsor Opportunity - QuantCo
email.text:
Hi everyone!
I hope exams and/or FYP are going well for you all!
Just a quick email from me to let you know about an opportunity from one of sponsors, QuantCo.
Sign up [here](https://jobs.lever.co/quantco-/db4f929a-7f83-4b81-aaba-a34bfdbba3e6).
